title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
Product Name: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black

Experience the soothing comfort of the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. This sleek, black 1-gallon capacity humidifier is designed to provide relief from dry air, helping you breathe easier and sleep more comfortably.

Equipped with a low tank indicator, this humidifier ensures you're always aware of when it's time for a refill. The tank itself is dishwasher-safe, making cleaning a breeze. With a humidity capacity of 142 ml per hour, this humidifier offers efficient operation to keep your space comfortably moisturized.

The humidifier also features an aroma tray, allowing you to enjoy your favorite essential oils for an added touch of relaxation. With three speed settings, you can customize the mist output to suit your preferences. The mechanical knob control makes it easy to adjust settings, while the coverage area of 320 square feet ensures this humidifier can effectively serve medium to large-sized rooms.

Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this humidifier is portable and easy to move around your home. It uses evaporative technology for a cool mist output, and includes empty tank protection for added safety. The humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter, ensuring long-lasting performance.

Upgrade your comfort with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, a reliable and efficient solution for dry air conditions.
